---
title: "Czech Vegetation Database"
---

This is a website for the study materials related to the courses on data analysis at the [Department of Botany and Zoology](https://botzool.sci.muni.cz), Faculty of Science, Masaryk University.


Moreover, this website contains guidelines for the use of AI in ecology.
